title: The Rockets Are Burning Out Their Fuse. Plus: Sleeper Draft Picks with Jonathan Tjarks and J. Kyle Mann. | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC get into the absolute dumpster fire raging in Houston right now with Westbrook forcing a trade and multiple role players expressing discontent (1:00), then get into other trades that could happen next week (26:45). Then The Ringer’s Jonathan Tjarks and J. Kyle Mann join KOC go team by team looking at potential late-first- and second-round draft picks (39:00).
Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
Guests: Jonathan Tjarks and J. Kyle Mann
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
